alert.note: Alert for Collin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 10:03AM CST until March 04 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... East Fork Trinity River At McKinney affecting Collin County. Sister Grove Creek Near Blue Ridge affecting Collin County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sister Grove Creek Near Blue Ridge. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding along the creek is expected. Rural roads, along with farm and ranch land near the creek, will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 24.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
